text.section:
A political subdivision may designate a community action agency to serve a community within the political subdivision or may change or revoke a designation by:
an act, ordinance, or resolution of its governing body; or
an order of its chief executive, if the chief legal officer certifies in writing that the chief executive has power to make the designation.

section.section: The governing body shall notify the public and hold a public hearing before a designation is made, changed, or revoked.
A transition or close-down plan shall accompany the notification of a proposed change or revocation of a designation.

text.section: A change in or revocation of a designation takes effect at the start of the State fiscal year.
